Hope you guys like the Friends Only banner. I made it myself :-) I think it's pretty good for a beginner!! What do you think? :-) ♥

Oh my. I forgot to write about Missy Higgins.
Kane and I saw her on Monday night and she was awesome. She played at Enmore so we got their early enough to have a nice dinner at an Italian restaurant courtesy of Kane [ ♥ him ] He is the bestest friend anyone could ever ask for.
She was absolutly brilliant and she is really funny and nice and such an Aussie. Will post the set list a little bit later :-)

Wow I haven't properly updated in ages. Lik Sharne I may do this in point form because it seems so much easier :-)

01- Bulldogs have lost many many games in a row and therefore Kate is not happy. Oh well, I can only hope they will pick up their form again soon and start to play better for my sanity and the sanity of all the fans and for the team.
02- As most of you should know I now work at Penrith Pilates and my job involves looking after two kids James and Ellie. Ellie is six and so adorable. Sometimes I hate the job but today made me smile. She told me she had a secret to tell and whispered in my ear "I'm glad your our babysitter Kate" and when I made dinner she goes "thank you for a lovely meal Kate." I can't wait to have kids.
03- Started my new program at the gym today. Nigel took me for it and I did a 5km bike ride and 2km row to start off with. I'm feeling so much better lately because of my old program/new program and my Pilates. Can't wait to get back into basketball and I think I'm starting netball too. So should be good.
04- finally got my new bed put in today. Waahoo
05- I can't believe I don't have much to write. Lol. After I haven't updated for so long.
Meh
Bye

Hehe oh how I heart this new layout. I woulda liked it better if it were Summer but its still pretty cool!! What you think?
Proper update coming soon. I promise guys! ♥
I'm fixing the layout... I'm not a big fan...

I'm not a perfect person As many things I wish I didn't do But I continue learning I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is you I'm sorry that I hurt you It's something I must live with everyday And all the pain I put you through I wish that I could take it all away And be the one who catches all your tears Thats why i need you to hear I've found a resaon for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is You [x4] I'm not a perfect person I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is you I've found a reason to show A side of me you didn't know A reason for all that I do And the reason is you wow i never noticed how much these lyrics sum things up between me and a certain person and our certain issues. shmeh. I'll update with a proper update quite soon if i can be bothered.

Stolen from mindxofxmyxown --------------------Standard Stuff---------------------------- x School: whats that? x E-mail: babygirl_2nv@hotmail.com x Eyes: hazel x Hair: blonde x Height: 165cm x Shoe Size: 7-8 x Who lives with you? mum dad 2 bros x When is your bedtime? whenever. --------------------In the Last 24 Hours----------------------- x Cried: no x Worn jeans: yes x Met someone new: no x Done laundry: yes x Cursed: cursed is my middle name x Watched a Movie: yes x Went to the movies: no x Went shopping: of course x Gotten sick: no x Been kissed: no x Given a kiss: no x Lied: no ----------------------Have You Ever------------------------- x Missed school cuz of weather: lol i wish x Lit yourself on fire: nope x Kept a secret from everybody: i have... not many though x Had an imaginary friend: yes x Ever been in love with a friend: yes x Cried during a Movie? oh yes. crying during a movie is also another of my middle names. x Had crush on an teacher? not that i can recall. x Been on stage: heaps!! drama, dancing, public speaking. i used to be such a nerd x Cut your own hair: yeah, x Done drugs: yes x Seen a murder: no, . ------------------------Your Firsts------------------------------ x First best friend: first ones that COUNT? sarah jane x First car: matchbox x First real date: with kane to the movies i think. hehe x First real break-up: daniel x First self purchased album: not sure x First piercing/tattoo: my ears. then my ears again. then my top left ear. then my ears again. then my naval. then my tongue. lol x First enemy: amanda pisani. x First big trip: queensland x First Kiss: steven quartermain (proper kiss hehe) x First failing grade: maths in year 8, 9, 10, 11 haha ----------------------In the Last Week ------------------- x Been mean: yes. x Been sarcastic: yes x Talked to someone you have a crush on: yes x Hugged someone: yeah x Fought with your parents? all the time x Got in an argument with your best friend: nope x Laughed until you cried: probably. x Played Truth or Dare: no, x Watched a sunrise/sunset: watched the sunset while i was driving today x Went to the beach at night: not lately. -------------------Who Did this Last----------------- x Called you: kane :-) x Slept in your bed: me x Saw you cry: nath, daniel, scott, marty, brook (haha i was drunk not cool) x Made you cry: daniel x Made you laugh: tony x You shared a drink with: no one. x You went to the movies with: marty cam scott mel colleen x Went out to eat with: nath n lea x Bought you something: kane x Sent you an email: ummm -------------------------- Extras ----------------------------- x Black or white? black x TV or movie? movie X Cat or dog? dog x Walmart or target? if by walmart u mean kmart. i choose target x Spring or Fall? spring. x Sun or rain? sun x What are you gonna do after this? sleep x What was the last meal you ate? chicken and chips x Are you bored? incredibly x Last noise you heard? the tv ------------------------Favorites---------------------------- x Shampoo: head and shoulders (works wonder) x Favorite Color: pink x Summer/Winter/Fall/Spring: summer x Favorite Movies: mean girls, lion king, shrek, walk to remember, empire records, butterfly effect, armadgeddan heaps x Favorite sport: basketball, footy ---------------------What are You?------------------------- x Wearing: blank work pants and my work shirt x Thinking about: im tired x Listening to: the tv ------------------------Have You Ever 2----------------------- x Been to Canada? nope. x Danced Naked? course x Skinny dipped? not really x Stalked someone? nope x Snuck out? yesss x Wished you were the opposite sex: yeah, just for the experience :P ------------------------ Random ---------------------------- x Are you bored? yes x Are you lonely? yes x Are you happy? try to be x Do you drink? drink is another of my middle names (i have a long name) x Who named you? my mum... wow sharne we have the same middle name. only spelt different. it is such a common middle name x When was the last time you showered? this morning x What color pants do you have one right now? black x What song are you listening to right now? tv still x What color is your shirt? black x What is right next to you? my shoes x What is your computer desk made of? wood x Are you eating anything? no X What did you do last night? had cutlets for tea. watched o.c went on net. went to bed x How are you today? so so ------------------------- Extras 2---------------------------- x Do you have your license? hell freakin yes. love it x what book are you reading now? nothing. oh does cosmo count? x Nickname: katie, kate, babygirl, kwate (ellie is so cute) x Pets: roxy and sally (dogs) gizmo and nemo (fish) x Siblings: brett 21 scott 19 x Have you ever been so drunk you didn't remember that you were drunk: lol yes. x Taken any illegal substances: yes. x Gone out in public in your pajamas? yesss. numerous times x Played ding-dong-ditch? umm. x Wanted to hook up with a friend/date them: yes of course! x Did something illegal? speeding, underage drinking, underage gambling (hey i couldnt help it. they were right infront of me) jaywalking. x Did you get caught? no x Gotten arrested? no x Gotten a ticket for something? no, not yet (touch wood) x Prank called someone: yeah who hasn't?! ---------------------Do You Believe In---------------------- x Yourself: sometimes x Santa Claus: nope x Tooth Fairy: nope x Destiny/Fate: of course. everything happens for a reason x Angels: yeah x God: yeah --------------------Friends and Life------------------------ x Do you have a girlfriend/boyfriend? I ♥ Kane J Piper sooooooo effin much its not funny.
As a late Christmas present (yes very late) he bought me tickets to Missy Higgins!!
and...
As much as he doesn't like her and told me he didn't want to come when I asked him... He's taking me! Aww aint he the bestest best friend in the world? I love him. No one else would do that for me.
I'm also going to see Grease onstage with my mum which I'm really looking forward to because I love Grease and Sandy and Danny and the whole freakin movie!
I bought two pairs of awesome shoes the other day. One pair is black the other HOT PINK and they are pointy heels. I love shoes like that. Now I have a white pair, a black pair and a hot pink pair which look awesome with my jeans and my black boobtube with hot pink on it. Hehe.

Thursday night was Nathan's leaving Maccas party. He worked at maccas for 6 years i think and now he has a job in the real world in HR after 3 years at uni. everyone was so happy for him. i went there after work it was an enjoyable night. had a few drinks of course and ended up in glenmore park crashing at my ex's best mates house. haha. michael's a champ though we get along so well and he looked after me heaps that night. it was good.
Friday I didnt really do much. went to scott's house that night because he was having a get together. didnt drink cos i had to drive but thats ok. had a big one on thursday and last sat so wasnt really in the mood.
saturday didnt do anything. leanne and i house sat for our bosses that night which was good. got money for just bumming at their house watching their tv and playing their playstation. hehe
today is easter and ive been doing nothing again. so boring. happy easter everyone.

Not that exciting. Especially when you don't know the people. Overall an awesome night!!

Oh my gawsh.
It's 5:55pm. I've been outta bed for about 20 minutes and had been in bed since I got home from Brooks at about 8:00am this morning.
Last night was great. From what I remember. I rocked up to Brook's at about 7. Cameron and I then went to Maccas to see Leanne cos it was her last shift there and then got back to Brook's at about 8. Thats when I started drinking. My four cruisers and my bottle of vodka. Haha. My bottle of vodka is empty and the cruisers are gone. Nice.
There were heaps of people there which was pretty awesome. At about 1, Pete, Ryan and I went to Embassy Pete certain I would get in off his sister's I.D. Which I did. Hehe. Embassy was pretty cool. We saw Pam there and I saw Sonja and I haven't seen Sonja in ages... Had another vodka and orange there which I probably shouldn't have. Oh well. We danced all morning till everyone got kicked out at 4am. Ryan dropped me back at Brook's and I crashed there before coming home this morning. Went to bed when I got home. Got up at about 11 to throw up. Lol. and then back to bed for me.
Was gonna go to the Panthers game but meh, I couldn't be bothered.

Damn Bulldogs lost. Meh oh well it's only round 2.

<lj-cut text="the special two">

I've hardly been outside this room in days,
'cause I don't feel that I deserve the sunshine's rays.
The darkness helps until the whiskey wears away,
And it's then I realize the conscience never fades.
When you're young you have this image of your life:
That you'll be scrupulous and one day even make a wife.
And you make boundaries you'd never dream to cross,
And if you happen to you wake completely lost.
But I will fight for you, be sure that
I will fight until we're the special two once again.

When we could only need each other, we'd breathe together,
Our hands would not be taught to hold another's,
When we were the special two.
And we could only see each other, we'd breathe together,
These arms will not be taught to need another,
'cause we were the special two.

I remember someone old once said to me:
"lies will lock you up with truth the only key."
But I was comfortable and warm inside my shell,
And couldn't see this place would soon become my hell.
So is it better to tell and hurt or lie to save their face?
Well I guess the answer is don't do it in the first place.
I know I'm not deserving of your trust from you right now,
But if by chance you change your mind you know I will not
Let you down 'cause we were the special two, and will be again.

And we will only need each other, we'll breathe together,
Our hands will not be taught to need another's,
When we're the special two.
And we could only see each other we'll breathe together,
These arms will not be taught to need another...

I step outside my mind's eye's for a minute.
And I look over me like a doctor looking for disease,
Or something that could ease the pain.
But nothing cures the hurt you bring onto yourself,
Just remembering, just remembering who we were...
</lj-cut>

so sorry For everytime you had to go asleep alone. For everytime I tried to rush you off the phone. For everytime I said something to make you cry. Now that all is said and done, I can't deny. I'm so sorry for anything I might have done. And I'm sorry, I never meant to hurt the only one, And I'm sorry, the best laid plans sometimes fall through, For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. For everytime I lied right to your face, And you knew it. For all the wasted time that we cannot replace. For everytime that a discussion turned into an argument, we'd fight. Hey, how I wish that I could have it back tonight. I'm so sorry for anything I might have done. And I'm sorry, I never meant to hurt the only one, And I'm sorry, the best laid plans sometimes fall through, For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. To try and count your tears, would be like standing in the rain. The weather's been bad, for that I'll gladly take the blame. Now our two separate lives will never ever be the same, But I hope that you can forgive someday. I'm so sorry for anything I might have done. And I'm sorry, I never meant to hurt the only one, And I'm sorry, the best laid plans sometimes fall through, For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. For anything that I might've done, I apologize to you. someday, someway, somehow I try to pull myself together, One lie, tore us apart. We left so many words unspoken. You walked away with my heart, And I cried, I cried. Heaven knows how much I cried. Could you find the strength within you, To give me one more try. If I called you, would you believe what I had to say, And if I saw you, would you, turn and run away. If I had my way girl, you'd be with me right now. Someday, someway, somehow. Someday, someway, somehow. I thought that I could go on without you. Guess what? I was so wrong, And I realized how much I really love you, And it's been far too long. I know you cried, I know you cried. Heaven knows how much you cried. But can you find the strength within you, To give me one more try. If I called you, would you believe what I had to say, And if I saw you, would you, turn and run away. If I had my way girl, you'd be with me right now. Someday, someway, somehow. Someday, someway, somehow. So come on, don't I get my one mistake. Let's forget about yesterday for tomorrow, I know we've found what's at the end of the rainbow, And it's meant to be, it's meant to be, If I called you, would you believe what I had to say, And if I saw you, would you, turn and run away. If I had my way girl, you'd be with me right now. Someday, someway, somehow. Someday, someway, somehow. Someday, someway, somehow.

I ♥ it!

So my weekend was pretty stupid. lol. Leanne and I had to do our first aid certificate for work and it was hell boring! Considering I had done most of it in PE in year 11 and I had done a first aid certificate a while ago. Oh well. Two very long days of 8-5 thats why it sucked. We made some new friends though with some girls. Suzi, Sabrina and Vanessa. They seemed really nice. I was so proud when we were doin CRP and EAR and the guy asked if anyone knew what ECC was. No one said anything so I answered with "External Cardiac Compression" and everyone was like "woah how did u know that" even the smart adults didnt know that... thats what u get from PE :-) lol. Sat night wen to Jarod's party for a bit. Good times all round. Took Marty, Scott, Cam and Colleen with me cos then we were gonna go to Marty's. Marty got some weed off one of the guys and then we headed up the mountains to Marty. Left there about 12:30 cos I kept falling asleep. Had a massiave week last week with work so I was buggered. Yesterday first aid cert. again and then I done nothing at night and went to be really early. Working this arvo which should be alright. Lost basketball on Friday which sucks. We were soooo close. FOOTY SEASON KICKS OFF ON FRIDAY. HELL FECKING YEAH i cant wait

hehe how rad

Went to the doctor today to find out why I always get sore throats. He recommended I have a blood test and I might be aneamic. Also because I'm pale, and my nails are funny or something. It could be that or something else. He needs the blood test results to check my kidneys, liver, blood etc. etc. So we'll see how that goes hey!

Well my weekend has been alright.
Eyebrow wax yesterday, love em. Just makes me feel so much better. Afterwards my parents left for their little weekend away thingy. I was gonna have some people over last night but my bro went skitz so I didnt.This after Brook and I went and bought our alcohol and some food stuffs for the evening. Oh well.
So instead of that we went to the movies. We includes myself, Colleen, Mel, Marty, Cameron and Scott. We saw "Constantine" which was really stupid and weird and I didnt wanna see it but oh well. 
After that Marty, Cam and I went to Marty's house. Picked up some 'stuff' and headed back down the mountain. We stopped in at maccas to say hi to Troy who was on close. While at maccas Daniel rung Marty *Marty's sis is going out with Daniel's brother so they are pretty good mates* and was being all weird. He then came and saw us at maccas and was an emotional wreck (i dont know why) and we think he must've taking something. He said he wanted to talk to Marty and didnt even end up saying anything to them and then drove off. We're getting worried bout him cos he is always like that lately. *sigh*
We then drove back to my house, picked up my alco and some stuff, left the car there, and started walking back to Cameron's, drinking on the way. Ha Ha aren't we bums. Walking through the streets of Emu Plains at 11pm drinking. Was fun though. Got to Cameron's and sat out the back drinking and talking. It was good. A nice little catch up. Got home about 3am and I got out of bed at about 12:30. Works well for me!!
Tomorrow I start work at 7am :-( that sucks ass.

My day today was super!!! The Doggies 2004 Premiership Trophy Me and Aman Perry *very stretched out I know. lol* Me and Dr George Peponis Me and Luke Patten Me and Roy Asotasi Me and Andrew Ryan Me and Brent Sherwin Sonny Bill Williams. I love this guy. Hardly anyone got a photo with him because there were sooooo many people surrounding him. I got autographs though. So there you go. I know, I know I need to resize them. I was just so excited and couldn't wait to put them up on here so yeah!! I know people wont enjoy as much as I did. He he.
The lovely Brook and I!! He's a champ.

Your Seduction Style: Siren / Rake
You possess an unbridled sensuality that appeals to many. The minute you meet anyone, you can make the crave you almost immediately. You give others the chance to lose control with you... spiraling into carnal bliss. A dangerous lover, you both fascinate and scare those you attract.
What Is Your Seduction Style?

you're sexy, sultry, and super feisty. you're tons of
fun, especially in the bedroom, but you need to treat
people a little bit better - especially those who love you
and take care of you. it's okay to have fun, but don't
forget to say thank you!
